info.title: Cluster Aware MI Dashboard
info.description: This is to retrieve details from the rest api to the UI.

The configuration of the relevant artifact

details.description: String contains role, upTime, serverName, serverVersion, miHome, javaHome, javaVersion, javaVendor, osName
Array contains type, status, description, datsource provider, database engine, driver, url, username etc

configParameters.description: Array contains default auto commit, default read only, test on borrow, test on return, test while idle etc.

Heartbeat.description: The request body to update proxy.

ArtifactUpdate.description: The request body to update artifact.

AddLogger.description: The request body to add logger.

UpdateLogger.description: The request body to add logger.

AddUser.description: The request body to add user.

AddRole.description: The request body to add role.

UpdateRole.description: The request body to update role.
